content:
Hello,
I have a project (workspace) that builds fine, but cargo package fails, it somehow finds a dependency on crossterm 0.19.0 while its not used at all (crossterm 0.20.0 is used), cargo tree and cargo.lock both contains the correct recent crossterm version, I'm not sure where cargo package is picking up the old version?
I figured it out, one crate in the workspace had the old crossterm dependency, so it needed to be published to cratesio for the changes to be picked up.
